com.metreeca.rest

Interface Result<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value possibly returned by the operation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Failure, Message.Body

    public interface Result<V>
    HTTP processing result.

    Describes the result of an HTTP request processing operation that could either successfully return a value or report a failure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <R> Result<R> flatMap(Function<V,Result<R>> mapper)
      Maps the operation returned value.
      default Optional<V> get()
      Retrieves the operation returned value.
      default <R> Result<R> map(Function<V,R> mapper)
      Maps the operation returned value.
      <R> R map(Function<V,R> success, Function<Failure<V>,R> failure)
      Maps operation results.
      default Result<V> use(Consumer<V> success)
      Handles the operation returned value.
      default Result<V> use(Consumer<V> success, Consumer<Failure<V>> failure)
      Handles operations results.
      static <V> Result<V> value(V value)
      Creates an operation result with a returned value.

    • Method Detail

      • value

        static <V> Result<V> value(V value)
        Creates an operation result with a returned value.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the value returned by the operation
        Parameters:
        value - the value returned by the operation
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the value returned by the operation

      • get

        default Optional<V> get()
        Retrieves the operation returned value.
        Returns:
        an optional operation returned value, if one is present; an empty optional, otherwise

      • use

        default Result<V> use(Consumer<V> success)
        Handles the operation returned value.
        Parameters:
        success - a consumer accepting the operation returned value; invoked only if a value was actually returned by the operation
        Returns:
        this result
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if success or is null

      • map

        default <R> Result<R> map(Function<V,R> mapper)
        Maps the operation returned value.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the mapped returned value
        Parameters:
        mapper - the value mapping function
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the value generated by applying mapper to the returned value of this result, if one was present; a result providing access to the reported failure of this result, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • flatMap

        default <R> Result<R> flatMap(Function<V,Result<R>> mapper)
        Maps the operation returned value.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the mapped returned value
        Parameters:
        mapper - the value mapping function
        Returns:
        the result generated by applying mapper to the returned value of this result, if one was present; a result providing access to the reported failure of this result, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • use

        default Result<V> use(Consumer<V> success,
                      Consumer<Failure<V>> failure)
        Handles operations results.
        Parameters:
        success - a consumer accepting the operation returned value
        failure - a consumer accepting the operation reported failure
        Returns:
        this result
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either success or failure is null

      • map

        <R> R map(Function<V,R> success,
          Function<Failure<V>,R> failure)
        Maps operation results.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the final operation outcome
        Parameters:
        success - a function mapping from the returned value to the final operation outcome
        failure - a function mapping from the reported failure to the final operation outcome
        Returns:
        the final operation outcome, as generated by either success or failure according to the result state
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either success or failure is null or returns a null value
